basic_binary_iarchive.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_BINARY_IARCHIVE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_BINARY_IARCHIVE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // basic_binary_iarchive.hpp
00011 //
00012 // archives stored as native binary - this should be the fastest way
00013 // to archive the state of a group of obects.  It makes no attempt to
00014 // convert to any canonical form.
00015 
00016 // IN GENERAL, ARCHIVES CREATED WITH THIS CLASS WILL NOT BE READABLE
00017 // ON PLATFORM APART FROM THE ONE THEY ARE CREATED ON
00018 
00019 // (C) Copyright 2002 Robert Ramey - http://www.rrsd.com . 
00020 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00021 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00022 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00023 
00024 //  See http://www.boost.org for updates, documentation, and revision history.
00025 
00026 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/detail/workaround.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/serialization/pfto.hpp>
00029 
00030 #include <boost/archive/detail/common_iarchive.hpp>
00031 #include <boost/serialization/collection_size_type.hpp>
00032 #include <boost/serialization/string.hpp>
00033 
00034 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_prefix.hpp> // must be the last header
00035 
00036 namespace boost { 
00037 namespace archive {
00038 
00040 // class basic_binary_iarchive - read serialized objects from a input binary stream
00041 
00045 template<class Archive>
00046 class basic_binary_iarchive : 
00047     public detail::common_iarchive<Archive>
00048 {
00049 protected:
00050 #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, <= 1300)
00051 public:
00052 #elif defined(BOOST_MSVC)
00053     // for some inexplicable reason insertion of "class" generates compile erro
00054     // on msvc 7.1
00055     friend detail::interface_iarchive<Archive>;
00056 #else
00057     friend class detail::interface_iarchive<Archive>;
00058 #endif
00059     // intermediate level to support override of operators
00060     // fot templates in the absence of partial function 
00061     // template ordering. If we get here pass to base class
00062     // note extra nonsense to sneak it pass the borland compiers
00063     typedef detail::common_iarchive<Archive> detail_common_iarchive;
00064     template<class T>
00065     void load_override(T & t, BOOST_PFTO int version){
00066       this->detail_common_iarchive::load_override(t, static_cast<int>(version));
00067     }
00068     // binary files don't include the optional information 
00069     void load_override(class_id_optional_type & /* t */, int){}
00070 
00071     // the following have been overridden to provide specific sizes
00072     // for these pseudo prmitive types.
00073     void load_override(version_type & t, int){ 
00074         // upto 255 versions
00075         unsigned char x=0;
00076         * this->This() >> x;
00077         t = version_type(x);
00078     }
00079     void load_override(class_id_type & t, int){
00080         // upto 32K classes
00081         int_least16_t x=0;
00082         * this->This() >> x;
00083         t = class_id_type(x);
00084     }
00085     void load_override(class_id_reference_type & t, int){
00086         // upto 32K classes
00087         int_least16_t x=0;
00088         * this->This() >> x;
00089         t = class_id_reference_type(x);
00090     }
00091     void load_override(object_id_type & t, int){
00092         // upto 2G objects
00093         uint_least32_t x=0;
00094         * this->This() >> x;
00095         t = object_id_type(x);
00096     }
00097     void load_override(object_reference_type & t, int){
00098         // upto 2G objects
00099         uint_least32_t x=0;
00100         * this->This() >> x;
00101         t = object_reference_type(x);
00102     }
00103     void load_override(tracking_type & t, int){
00104         char x=0;
00105         * this->This() >> x;
00106         t = (0 != x);
00107     }
00108   void load_override(serialization::collection_size_type & t, int){
00109        unsigned int x=0;
00110        * this->This() >> x;
00111        t = serialization::collection_size_type(x);
00112    }
00113 
00114     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00115     load_override(class_name_type & t, int);
00116     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00117     init();
00118    
00119     basic_binary_iarchive(unsigned int flags) :
00120         detail::common_iarchive<Archive>(flags)
00121     {}
00122 };
00123 
00124 } // namespace archive
00125 } // namespace boost
00126 
00127 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_suffix.hpp> // pops abi_suffix.hpp pragmas
00128 
00129 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_BINARY_IARCHIVE_HPP
